name: Battleverse
description:
An exciting and fun Third Person Multiplayer Shooter game with 5 different levels and 4 different guns. 

This is a solo indie project i've been working on for the past five months solely as a hobby. This game is still a work in progress and is constantly being updated. Any sort of feedback or critique would be amazing, so please let me know if you encounter any bugs or issues in the comments below.
